channel.title: Server status
channel.description:
Hello,
Well me and whitey has been working on a server status so i thought i might as well show yours what its looking like so far
http://rune-mafia.com/Status/index.php
Adding server
http://rune-mafia.com/Status/index.php?p=new
Viewing server stuff
http://rune-mafia.com/Status/index.php?p=show&iid=1
Features Online sig (GFXing a new sig) Comments Login (to change your server contacts so on so on) Other features to :)
Well rate it please
~T X

item.title: Server status
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

[quote=“kloplop321, post:3, topic:175499”]you seem to be using Jagex’s title pic, I would suggest you don’t as they have the ability to file you for copywrite infrigement :([/quote]Lol the whole layout is Jagex’s

Read full topic

item.title: Server status
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

use a bigger font on the port number, the 9 is kinda thin.
It is quite good though in terms of ability, and here’s some questions I don’t have time to test(since class is over in like 4 mins)
do you have javascript protection MySQL injection safe?
and do you have it so that if you have it so that ’ doesn’t turn out like ’

you seem to be using Jagex’s title pic, I would suggest you don’t as they have the ability to file you for copywrite infrigement

Read full topic
